extendedInfo.description: Learn Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, and English. Totally fun and 100% free."Among apps for learning or practicing a language, you can't beat Duolingo." âPC Magazine. Awarded Editors' Choice for Language Learning."Far and away the best free language-learning app." âThe Wall Street Journal "Weâve also tried a few other methods such as book learning and Rosetta Stone, both of which bombed. Thatâs why I jumped at the chance to try Duolingo. And believe me, itâs addictive." âFluentIn3Months.com Send any feedback to android@duolingo.comDuolingo is changing the way people learn languages. â¢ It's free, for real. No fees, no ads, no gimmicks. A college-quality education without the price tag.â¢ It's fun. Lose hearts for answering incorrectly, advance by completing bite-sized lessons, and track your progress with shiny achievements.â¢ It's constantly improving. We bust out the lab coats regularly and measure how well you learn on Duolingo. Your learning experience only gets better over time.If you want to learn Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, or English, the fast, fun, and free way, there's no better choice than Duolingo.

reviews.title: This is so much fun!!!
reviews.comment: I really enjoy learning from this app. It\'s so much fun and easy that I forget that I\'m actually learning a new language.
reviews.author: Robert Tucker

reviews.title: Amzing and fun!!
reviews.comment: Finally, an app that is free amd is amazing! Makes me actually want to learn languages.  And feel confident in learning!
reviews.author: Lauren Burchett

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: A fantastic adaptation of their web client.  Fun and educational, also somewhat addicting, which is perfect for language learning.
reviews.author: Zach Goldberg

reviews.title: Very easy to learn with this system
reviews.comment: I Love this course  I feel very comfortable learning with this system I think everyone should have this.
reviews.author: Maria Bermudez

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great app and lots of fun :) please add japanese or chinese  (or both) as new languages!  That would be amazing!
reviews.author: merrick graham

reviews.comment: Great app! So easy to use and well made. One of my favorite apps now.
reviews.author: Kai Lotus

reviews.title: An excellent way to start learning a new language.
reviews.comment: Keep up the good work. I am really enjoying this app. Love the way you have arranged each chapter. Would love to see more languages being added in the near future.
reviews.author: Praswin Prakash

reviews.title: Great way to learn a new language
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app. I have only been using it for about a week but I already feel like I can retain the information better than formal language classes.
reviews.author: Dustin Grange

reviews.title: Amazing app!
reviews.comment: I love this app. It is really innovative and amazing for learning a language. I would love it even more if you add the \"Speak this sentence\" part of the tests.
reviews.author: Plamen Bogdanov

reviews.title: Great learning tool
reviews.comment: I\'ve really enjoyed using this learning app. Well structured and laid out and it\'s very satisfying when you reach another level. Muy bien.
reviews.author: Eric Blyth

reviews.title: Best app ever
reviews.comment: Helps me understand language better. Five stars, awesome app
reviews.author: Dottie Frailey

reviews.title: Great job
reviews.comment: Excellent and effortless way to learn a new language. I\'ve been using it for three weeks now and I\'m impressed.
reviews.author: Amin Manna

reviews.title: Super cool app.
reviews.comment: I\'m learning easily and in a fun way! Great app!
reviews.author: Candan Y\303\274cey\304\261ld\304\261z

reviews.title: The only app you\'re ever need
reviews.comment: It make learning a language a breeze.  It\'s fun, educational and addictive. A lot of work and logic went into getting this app to be user friendly.  Thanks so much.
reviews.author: Lavern Douglas

reviews.title: Flawless
reviews.comment: Beautiful interface and an excellent, user-friendly app to learn another language!
reviews.author: Ranisha Singh

reviews.comment: The best language app I have used so far. It is well made, easy to use, and great fun.
reviews.author: Christopeher Gayle

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: It\'s great, I love it! It would be nice if it had more languages though. Otherwise it has great lessons
reviews.author: abilene Garcia

reviews.title: Fun and addicting easy to learn
reviews.comment: Very good app easy to learn the language you choose! Also a little addicting
reviews.author: Gilbert Garcia

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: The one great component of a language course that is necessarily missing here is the conversational practice, but otherwise this is a great way to learn, or in my case refresh, the language skills.
reviews.author: Walter de Sagher

reviews.title: Wonderful!
reviews.comment: Eye pleasingly well made. I have learned so much in such a short time and it was fun!
reviews.author: Caitlyn Brown
